PROJECT(SUPERLU C)
IF(WIN32)
ADD_DEFINITIONS(-Dadd_ -DPRNTlevel=0
-Dd_cnjg=d_cnjg_slu
-Dd_imag=d_imag_slu
-Dz_abs=z_abs_slu
-Dz_div=z_div_slu
-D_CRT_SECURE_NO_WARNINGS
)
IF(MSVC)
SET (CMAKE_C_FLAGS "${CMAKE_C_FLAGS} /fp:strict")
SET (CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS} /fp:strict")
ENDIF(MSVC)
ENDIF(WIN32)

SET(SRCS
